content.detailedDescription:
i was sitting on my front porch around 7:00 in the evening facing north on taylor ave. my peripheral vision caught a light coming from my right (east). i did not have my glasses on at the time and the light appeared to be shaped like a christmas tree. i immediately put on my glasses and realized the christmas tree shape was just a blur because i didn't have the glasses on. upon looking at the object with my glasses on i realized it was an orange star like object but larger than a star, especially for that time of night when it is still light out.

 it kept moving steadily east for a minute or two, not very fast, just sort of gliding. all of a sudden it stopped cold and started to pulsate. for a while it pulsated at a steady rate then the pulsating became less
 and less until it completely dissipated from its hovering position. this "object" did not fly away, ascend or descend. it just dissolved. no sound at any time during experience.
content.summary: Noticed orange lite coming from east. stopped and hovered.Pulsated for 30 seconds or so. pulsations became less intense . object dissipated.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi there. i've never had an occurrence of actually witnessing a ufo before. usually i find a logical explanation for things flying around in the night sky however, this i could not explain.

in the vicinity of imperial hwy and kellogg dr in the anaheim hills area of southern california i saw quite an interesting sight tonight. the craft was clearly a triangle shape and had 3 lights that looked immensely similar to a stealth fighter however, these lights were led in appearance. the front of the craft had a red non-blinking light. the center of the craft had a surging light that evenly distributed itself to the 3 led lights. the aircraft circled and hovered doing figure 8s and coasting the tree line for about 5-10mins. no sound. height im not sure of but possibly the same of a plane at a low, safe flying elevation. my first guest was a drone but the surging light is what was the interesting part and the led which i'm not aware of any craft having. i am wondering if u have any records or pictures for me to look at to see if u have any similar cases? unfortunately i did not have my camera with me. i'm curious to know what i saw tonight.

kind regards, 
andrew
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Looked like a stealth fighter or tr-3b

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I'm living in south of france. i would like to report a ufos sighting that i have captured using my cellphone (iphone5) camera. what amazed me after 3 shots that i took, is that i didn't notice the object at that time. it was a terrible weather that day of june 13, 2013. we are expecting a powerful thunderstorm that day so i took a photo of the clouds forming just above the yacht. powerful lightning was experienced that day cutting electricity 4-5 times all over "-5 villages. it was not a plane nor a helicopter, it was totally different. i tried to zoom the image and did some color changing just to figure out exactly the shape of the object using an enhancement application in the iphone and i keep on having a dark shade beneath the object itself like a source of heat or something. some could argue that it's a clouds forming shapes which i thought it was but clouds cannot do a triangular shapes. i do have a photo of clouds making a circular shapes but triangular shapes with almost perfect straight line that is a bit "impossible". i am sharing this genuine photo just to hope that someone out there may enlighten us to what exactly this objects
 and also kindly take a look also at the far right side of the photo. there is another object that is floating above and that shape is very similar to a ufo sigted around the world... 

many thanks
content.summary: surprised, amazed, grateful on that day. because now i can really accept that they do really exist.

content.detailedDescription: Preface: there are plenty of commercial planes, private planes, military planes and helicopters and i have see enough to recognize this as none of the above. there were planes in the sky at this time. they always show flashing, colored lights at some point in their flight. i was intentionally sitting out back by the pool watching the sky, with the hope of seeing a ufo on the 4th of july.... again. i saw a similar one (not quite the same... 4 lights under one vehicle) 2 years ago, but did not look for one last 4th of july. this consisted of a bright light coming out of the south, directly at me, in the far distance. after a few seconds i could see that it wasn't one light, but two. when i could see the clear separation between the lights, i watched as the vehicle slowly turned 90 degrees to the east (as the two lights merged with the turn), proceeded a short distance, stopped for a few seconds (as to watch some fireworks below?), slowly backed back up onto the original flight path (as one light again became two), then continue almost directly over me at a fairly low altitude (lower than any passing commercial jet and somewhere close to single engine private plane low to medium altitude). it was flying faster than any plane, jet or prop, but not super fast. it continued to the northwest and disappeared toward the big dipper at a constant rate of speed. i estimate the total time i saw it from horizon to horizon was about a minute. no plane that we have would clear that distance in that time at that low altitude and not make a sound.
content.summary: Pair of low lights came directly at me, made turn, stopped, reversed, resumed path.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside taking pictures of this months full (blue) moon with my new samsung 16 megapixel camera. after downloading the pictures to my computer a noticed a contrail next to the moon. after zooming in to see the type aircraft it was. i was surprised to see there were actually 3 contrails merging into one. i found it strange, i could not see the aircraft that were making the contrails. i have taken many pictures of high altitude aircraft and even with my old 5 megapixel camera, i could zoom in to see the type craft. more surprising i could see there were round objects following behind in the contrail. one of the objects stayed with the flight until the last picture. the objects may have been illuminated by the sun as it was 8:30pm and the sun had just set. if that were the case then why not the objects in front as well. you can see the cloud formations in the sky do not change in the different pictures but the object/objects stay in the same place in the contrail. i am 65 years old and have lived my entire life near a large air force base. i spend a lot of time looking up. i would judge these objects to be in the 35000 to 40000 foot of altitude range. the other strange thing. the speed seemed to be somewhat faster then other aircraft i have recorded at that altitude. all the pictures i have submitted were taken within 45 to 50 seconds. you can see the distance covered in that time was quite fare. i live on the east coast water front. i don���t often see things flying west to east as these were. only thing between me and europe is the atlantic. i am sending all pictures i took that night. i am also sending the pictures i zoomed in on that got my attention.
content.summary: Objects seemed to be following in aircraft contrail

content.detailedDescription: We had just come from gambling at colousa casino driving back home to sacramento. when nwe came into the town of colousa when i noticed a bright light off to our right. i told the driver to turn down the street where the light was coming from. as soon as we turned, there was a saucer shaped object hovering in the sky about rooftop height. we sat and watched for an unknown amount of time. it was light out when we stopped but dark when we left. i wanted to get out of the car but could not say so. i tried to move to get out of the car but was also unable to move. i knew it was a ufo up close and personal. i didn't think about the sighting for many years and then i remembered it. i asked the driver if she remembered it and she said oh yeah. we were both certain that it was a ufo. we discussed it and remembered that we didn't realize at the time how long we stayed watching it. we knew that several hours must have passed due to the change of daylight when we finally left. the ufo was still there when we left. neither of us remember anything but sitting there unable to move. i have had other sightings but those were at a distance and just lights that changed direction too fast and too imposswible for a plane.
content.summary: Noticed a bright light, turned on street to see better.

content.detailedDescription: I left my apt to go and clock out at my place of work and whin i came to start walking home i saw the light it was the size of a street light and it the flying right at me and took a left and it was gone no sound at all.
content.summary: It was coming right at me and took a lelf and was gone

content.detailedDescription:
Been seeing odd things in the sky the last two evenings.

probably weather balloons, but still odd.

around 8:00 pm wednesday (8-21-2013)evening saw a round glowing object way up there against the clear blue sky, almost directly over head. it looked like venus, but much bigger and brighter. venus could barely be seen at this time to the west, as the sun was still bright on the horizon.

checked the object with binoculars and could tell it was not a star or planet. looked at it with a telescope, and it looked like a shiney almost transparent bubble with a line hanging off the bottom with a shiny object dangling wildly on the other end of the line. tried to record it with a 40x zoom videocam, but could not pick up the small line and dangling object. tried to set the camera up on a tripod in case the object vanished, but was too late. after 20 minutes of observation, the object vanished against a clear blue sky while perfectly visable.

thursday evening at 7:22pm saw an identical object as the night before. this time to the west. kept it in view with a telescope. after a few minutes, the object appeared to explode like a 4th of july fireworks mortar with a very bright yellow display hanging in the bright blue daylight sky. slowly, it appeared the debris was falling after it exploded. about two minutes later, another like object was observed to the south. watched this second object for a few minutes with a telescope, then put my videocam on a tripod and started recording. about 10 minutes later, this second object also appeared to explode against the clear blue sky! i analized the video of the object, and it appears that the second object seperated into 5 seperate disc when it broke appart. it looked just like a stack of poker chips falling one by one!

like i said, this might be weather balloons, but how in the world can a balloon seperate into five flat disc-like objects??

i have video, but no way to attach the dvd video file.
content.summary: Thought to be  weather balloons, then one exploded and another seperated into 5 disc-like objects?

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv, looked up to see "my" star as i call it than just above the star i see almost each night from s.W. to west in front of my home. but this night i saw a lg round object just up to the right of the star that was almost as big as an aspirin none glowing, more metallic looking kind of like a ring only something in the middle. i woke up my sister who was asleep by the window and said"what is that?"  i went into my bedroom and got my camera, went outside on the front porch and took a picture, than tried to get my camera to zoom in but camera won't work. all of a sudden i looked up and say a bright yellow cigar shaped object comming across, through wires across the street that looked as it would hit the top of my neighbors house and also some tall trees, which are not there any longer, but cell tower still is. i was sure the object would hit one or all of those things so put my body in a crouching postion and closed my eyes. by than object was gone. i was scared, upset seeing this object while looking at it, afraid they would see me taking a picture and later afraid to report it. afraid other people would think me a nutcase. but it has been 6 yrs. now and i don't care. i think of the incounter a lot and just want to forget about it. it was so much bigger than my star but not as big as an aircraft. no aircraft has ever crossed from weat to southeast ever in the almost 20 yrs. i' ve lived here!
content.summary: Observed first out front window.  went outside, took a picture than camera would not take any more.  while trying to get camera to work, suddenly saw a bright yellow object in next door neighbors'  just above his roof line.  almost hit house & trees.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside my home watching stars and satellites cross the sky. easily can tell satellites between planes and stars as satellites move rather fast (20,000 mph or so) and hold course and have no blinking lights on them. anyhow, i was watching what i thought was a satellite cross the sky east to west when all of a sudden this light shot outward into space at what must have been easily 100,000 mph+. it was so fast that it almost looked like a lightning strike shooting from our sky into outer space. there was no sound at all. i just stood there in shock watching the point out in space where the light vanished wondering if it would come back. it never did. please tell me someone else saw this.
content.summary: Star like light accelerated to unbelievable speeds after direction change.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on 71 highway near belton, missouri on my way back home from visiting family when i noticed vehicles driving off of the road.  there was a small glowing spherical object that was a bright white/yellow color coming towards me from north to south, and diving at vehicles.  i heard no sound, but there was a trail of light behind the object.  the size of it was a lot smaller than a car, but it was moving very quickly so i can't be certain as to the exact size. many cars and trucks ran off the road in an effort to avoid a collision with the object, some cars crashed, and some vehicles stopped to assist other cars, which drove off into the ditch.  the object flew right over my car, as i headed north, but did not affect my vehicle. it seemed to be running more cars off the road that were headed southbound.  i was too afraid to stop, and kept moving my car forward slowly to avoid colliding with other cars or trucks.  there were at least two 18-wheelers involved and many cars, at least 15 vehicles or more were involved. i last saw the object as it moved into some brush to the west of the highway, but i don't know if it landed. if i hadn't of seen this with my own two eyes i would never have believed it. the story was on the news about the crashes, however, not one word about the object that caused the crashes was mentioned. i find it very odd that no one involved in the wrecks mentioned this glowing object diving at cars, and if they did it was kept out of the media. the whole thing scared me so much that i did not talk about it with anyone until recently, and at the request of a friend i am filing this report with mufon.
content.summary: Observed a ufo diving at 15 or more vehicles and causing them to wreck

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were checking out the area near corona crash site of  1947. we took some photos with our iphones . when we got back home, we noticed something in our photo. when the photo was taken , no a/c , birds, or debris was visible in the air. we heard no sound. i do not know what the object is... i've tried to analyze the pic but no great results.
content.summary: Took pic with iphone , upon arrival at home in tx, i noticed something in the picture that was not visible when  taken..

content.detailedDescription:
I came home to visit my family and friends for a long overdue vacation in wisconsin.  i live in texas, but wisconsin is my home.  my cousin and her husband scheduled a golf outing at glacier wood golf course in iola, wi.  iola is a small town about 18 miles due east of stevens point, wi.  our golf outing was rather long as we arrived shortly after 4pm cst and played 18 holes.  our group consisted of 6, with 4 of us actually golfing.  we decided to have some drinks on the course and played at our own pace.  by the time we reached the 16th hole it had become very dark so we scrambled the final 3 holes in the darkness.  we were met by two attendents who were waiting for us to finish up.  we finished our round shortly after 9pm.

on our way back, we were travelling west on hwy 161 toward stevens point to end our evening and head back home to wausau.  about two miles before reaching the intersection of hwy 161 and hwy 10 (about 9 miles due east of stevens point) i noticed from the back seat of our car two large, non-pulsating, white lights in the se sky while gazing at the stars.  i consider myself to be an amateur astronomer so i love tracking celestial bodies.  the lights were both on what i would call the nw-side of the object, or "rear".  i call it the "rear" of the craft because it moving very slowly in se vector that is perpendicular to the arrangement of the two lights.  the two lights were essentially arranged in a line with one light in the ne corner and one in the sw corner of the object.  i could not see a third light in the front of the object, but the space between the two lights and slightly in front of it (in the se direction) was solid black.  i know that it was a solid object because of the few stars it passed, it would leave a void of darkness until passing through.  it completely blacked out these stars while it tracked slowly across the sky, heading se.

i immediately turned the attention of the craft to my girlfriend, sister, and brother-in-law, but they didn't really seem to care.  i don't even know if anyone else looked at it.  i got the best look at it as we stopped at the intersection of hwy 10 and hwy 161 and paused for our right-turn onto hwy 10.  from this point on we continued to head west in the vehicle as the object continued to slowly head se, away from us as a slow pace.  after about 3 miles of travelling west on hwy 10, i lost sight of the object due to our heading and the distance put between my line of sight.

during the entire time of my sighting, i made sure to remember the details so i could report it.  this was my first ufo sighting.  i have seen plenty of satellites, meteors, etc. tracking the skies, but never anything like this.  i have heard the stories of the triangle shaped craft, and this is the most apparent thing i can think of that compares to it.  the only difference being that the front of the craft didn't have a light that i could see on it.  however, the back two corners did.  i also know that this object was solid inbetween the lights and that solid space extended out toward the direction it was moving.  it is impossible to determine the height of the object, however.  i also made sure that i accurately estimated the zenith in the sky as well as the time and the apparent speed (speed is easy to track if you can see how far apart the lights are from one another).  in this case, the lights remained attached by darkness (a void or the solid part of the object) that swallowed the starlight as it passed.  as a result, i would say that the distance between the lights would shrink by half every 30 seconds or so.  keep in mind that this also includes us travelling ca. 70mph away from it.  however, when we were stopped, i estimate that the distance between the two rear lights shrank by half every minute.  this is only an estimate, however.

during the entire experience i made sure to stay calm and remember as many details as possible, knowing that i had to report it.  my only regret is waiting this long to actually do so, but the images are fresh in my mind.  i am highly educated (i hold a masters degree in geography), i watch the skies frequently, and i know a lot about aircraft.  as a kid i wanted to be a piolot.  i know about most aircraft out there as the janes aircraft dictionary series is one of my favorites.  be assured - this was not an airplane.  it was too large, too low (i estimate about 3000 feet above if the distance between the lights is 300 feet).  also, none of the lights were blinking and they were too big to be navigation lights.  they also were not green or red.  it was more like two large landing lights in both corners that never waned or moved.  i cannot speculate on sound, but it was very smooth and was in no hurry to traverse the skies.  there were other people on the road that night, including some that were travelling in the se direction of the craft on hwy 10.  maybe somone else saw it too.

i hope this description helps.  i can make a map and even attempt to sketch what i saw if you like.

dan berens
content.summary: Dark object with two solid, white lights sighted se of hwy 10 in custeer, wi

content.detailedDescription: In may 2004 i lost my mom i had moved in with friends in the abla homes in the city of chicago loop district. around 9:45-10:30pm i was sitting on porch at 916 s. ada i looked up into sky and noticed 3 bright glowing lights in a single file line, i first thought someone shooting flares or fire works because the area i was in is not to far from us celluar field and the lake front but noticed the lights were to close to be coming from either. after watching for about 5min alone i thought if they were flares they should have burned out then out of the blue the bottom light descended slowly then ascended rapidly back in place now at this time i thought ok chris you just lost your mom and still grieving maybe mind playing tricks. i then went into friends house got 3 people and ask them to look in the direction i was pointing they looked in amaze as the 3 objects then started descending slowly pulsating then ascend rapidly hovering in place. i called 911. after watching for about 10min friends went back in side to finish drinking i don't drink i stayed alone watching objects descend and ascend 1 by 1 glow bright then dim at times when objects started moving south they formed a triangle formation and moved away slowly i walked in the direction they moved lost sight of around 18th and blue island. i was afraid but more curious
content.summary: Sitting on friends porch i noticed 3bright lights hovering in sky. i then notified 3 friends to look we watch descend then ascend,bright glow then weakend at times i observed objects for abouts 25-30 min. i then watch object move south.

content.detailedDescription:
Close encounter in the backyard while having dinner (3 adults 2 teens): it was surreal. brother in law went from under the canopy and walked into yard (to pass gas). he exclaimed "what is that" and pointed to the sky. he said to his daughter "that looks like what your mom called and told you about." i walked over and looked and said it's the planet mars - because of the reddish color - then i realized it was too big to be a planet and it was moving in a north westerly direction. 

every one got up to look. i asked me son to grab the binoculars. everybody took a turn looking. i couldn't get a good focus so i passed them on. my spouse and son saw red lights on the glowing orange disc.

the 1st one came from the south west, hovered then traveled towards our direction. it stopped, hovered (almost directly over us) and then began to ascend until it disappeared. as it was ascending my spouse noticed that our bedroom light switched on then off. the 2nd one also came from the south west & followed the same trajectory. it began to ascend but in an easterly direction until it was out of sight.

the first one was spherical & glowing orangish red. the second one was identical to the first one but it had a distinctly red segment along with the orange. there was no sound and there were aeroplanes in the sky - the glowing objects definitely didn't look like the aeroplanes!

it was surreal. when i realized it wasn't a planet or any aircraft that i was familiar with i felt both curious and "on guard". (the thought that it could be a developmental craft came to mind but then i thought who in their right mind would fly 2 prototypes at once over a densely populated area. we constantly see helicopters, private & commercial planes flying in the skies.) these objects were not like anything i/we had seen before.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 adults, 2 teenagers having dinner in back yard adult observed glowing orange/red glowing object & pointed it out.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were at the toledo museum of art, outside, for their fri. night live music. the sky was for the most part, clear. overhead there were some very interesting thin cloud formations, and as i looked up, off to the east, i noticed an extremely brilliant, what appeared to be, star, but what also caught my eye was the less brilliant star slightly off to the right and down a few degrees, traveling at the same speed as the brilliant star. i quickly said to my friend kay, " kay, quick, look, and pointed to the direction of the ( stars ). she saw them, and then as we were watching them continue towards where we eventually would not be able to see them, the less brilliant (star) peeled off into a south east direction and out of sight. at that time having both of them in sight as that was happening, i saw to puffs of white smoke apparently coming from the brilliant star, and staying in the sky where they were created, as the brilliant star continued on it's course. those two puffs of smoke stayed there for quite some time. as re-played this viewing in my mind, it just didn't add up. all of what we saw, appeared to be in space, not in our atmosphere. the movement of the these two (stars) was that of a satellite, which i have seen at night.
content.summary: Appeared to be two stars, one brillant, moving like satellites, the less brilliant pleeling off, while the other stayed it's course.

content.detailedDescription: Seven adults sitting on the beach noticed a solid red rectangular object in the night sky out over the water. the sky was clear. the object remained stationary for a few minutes, never varying in size or shape and then appeared to lift away in a light mist. a photo was taken on my cell phone as it began to lift away but its not very good.
content.summary: Group of seven adults sitting on the beach noticed a solid red rectangular light in the night sky out over the water, didnt appear to be too far away and not very high. object did not move and then lifted away slowly

content.detailedDescription:
Round sphere, stationary until i stopped. it moved instantly at high speed with no sound.

two years later, ten miles south in the same valley it happened again.
content.summary: Hovered, i stopped, it accelerated instantly to sonic speed without sound.

content.detailedDescription: I was parked on a street in long island city which is located in queens new york. the street i was parked on at the time is between the mid-town tunnel(which leads into manhattan)and the long island expressway. i adjusted my seat to lean back giving me a clear view of the sky which was overcast at the time. no soon as i looked at the sky a dark/black triangle ufo flew overhead and was out of sight in seconds. i knew right away that it was one of the triangle ufo's that have been reported in the mid-west and western states. it wasn't the large 'mother ship' reported, this was the smaller version. like i mention it was triangle in shape and seemed to glide effortlessly through the air. the had a dull dark/black color to it, hand not lights emitting from it, it seemed to be smooth. it was so low that if it were a conventional plane i would have seen the passengers in the windows; the ufo flew towards the direction of manhattan. when i notice the ufo fly over the car, i immediately got out to get a view of it but was no were to be seen. when i got back into my car i thought "well, you saw a 'triangle'".
content.summary: Just happen to look up at the sky, which was overcasted, and witnessed a triangle shaped dark/black ufo overhead

content.detailedDescription: I live in north highlands , ca. ( a sub-division of sacramento county). i was sitting out in my backyard at night just doing some star gazing. something i like to do on clear nights. i live near an air force base so i am used to the choppers and jets and cargo planes and private jets and all that...... i know what they look like in the day or the night. i know what they sound like even more. i see and hear 'em all the time. well, on the night of august 23, 2013 around 10pm i was star-gazing and noticed a bright white round object(which i thought was a star at first)moving. it was going rather slow in a straight line. this object was about 500-600 ft. high up but it was large enough where i could see it in good detail. at first i thought it just might be a chopper with it's searchlight on. but i know how those things are at night. they swivle and sway and so do their lights as a result; not to mention all the other lights they possess. no, this object was solid white and had a faint fuzzy white glow to it. at first, i was in an observation mode trying to deduct all of the possibilities of what it could be. i thought it couldn't be a plane, they have wing lights on during flight. a chopper.... same thing. this object had absolutely no sound to it whatsoever. i now knew i was looking at a u.F.O. when the said object's light started to dim out more and more until it just disappeared. i looked for tail or wing lights after that.... but nothing was seen. there were no horizons or buildings or mountains or anything to cause an obstruction to my view. it just disappeared. i was amazed asto what i just witnessed. i am wondering if anyone else in northern ca. or more specically in sacramento has seen anything like this recently? or am i just nuts ;-)....No videos or pics ....Sorry !..!                                                                         u
content.summary: Bright white lighted orb at night  seen north east going in straight line then disappearing

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home when i came to a stop sign, i notice someone taking a picture/filming with his cellphone pointed towards the sky. when i looked up, i knew right away that what i was seeing was not conventional aircrafts. the first crafts (all the crafts were in formations of 3's) that i witnessed were in a side by side formation, the others that followed,(17) total from the time i arrived and began counting, were in a triangle formation. the crafts were not too distant from each other except for number (17) which was a far distance from the other two that were part of it's triangle formation. the lights emitting from the ufo's where not of standard aircrafts. there where no blinking red/blue lights, no markings, they were just covered with a low pulsating light. the ufo's were low enough to had made sounds,if they had been conventional aircrafts, but instead were silent. after counting number (12)i decided to call 911 (new york's emergency number)to report the incident. as i descripted what i witnessed to the operator more crafts appeared. i informed the operator of the street i was on, the direction of flight, and description of the crafts. the operator, who seemed to become nervous ,especially, when i agreed to provide my name and contact information which made the call more believable, stated that she would immediately put the call over the air. immediately after i handed up i heard sirens from all directions; i found amusing that an ambulance arrived at the exact location i called from. i was just getting into my car when they arrived. they looked around saw people looking up to the sky and left the area. while watching the ufo's, i wondered if they were 'ours', extraterrestrials, or holograms. i lost sight of them as they past overhead seemed to ascend. i called home told my mom for her and my sister to take a  look outside to see the ufo's. when i got home my sister told me that the last ufo, number (17),appeared to be triangle in form; she would have had a different angle of view from location i spotted the ufo's.
content.summary: Total of 17 ufo's in formation of 3's. the first that i observe where side by side the one's that followed where in triangle formation.

content.detailedDescription: 8/14/2013 5:19am i was driving to work from surprise az, to central phoenix. i stopped at a stop sign on the access road to grand ave. and saw there was a nice cloud formation backed by a colorful sunrise. i often takes pictures of scenes like this, when i can, and since there were no cars behind me this early, i decided to snap one of this view. grand ave runs diagonal (s/e - n/w).I held my phone/camera out of the drivers side window and took the shot facing east at the sunrise. i took two shots and never even reviewed them until a few days later (monday august 19th 2013). i was at home using my phone to view my pics on my tv and that's when i noticed the glowing lights in the sky above the clouds. the tv doesn't have the function to zoom in so i had to look back at my phones screen to zoom in and was in aw at what i was looking at. 6 orbs of light in a circular or oval shape. i'm not sure if they were separate objects or all a part of one object. i live near luke airforce base and see fighter jets all the time but this was definitely not one of them.
content.summary: On my way to work, i took a picture of the sunrise. later discovered the orb formation in my photo.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the backyard after it rained around 11:15pm (mtn time), the moon was full and breaking through the clouds and thats when i saw this thing i thought was a bird heading se, until i realized this was some sort of craft that stayed in the shadows of the clouds,very noticeable and it was wide,fast,matched clouds,moved gracefully like an ice skater in sky and looked like the back of the star trek ship but had a point in the front. this   was the second time i noticed and reported something this amazing in the sky, plus dia is not that far from where i live. something is going on in our skies and i know our airplane pilots have to see these thing because there above cloud level with a better view of these crafts. its not,if we will find out these things are, but when! thanks mufon for giving people, like me a place to report these incidents. theres nothing we can do, we will never catch them.   thans


[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Wide,fast,matched clouds,moved gracefully like an ice skater  in sky

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were traveling south along the lakeshore (lake michigan) just out for a nice romantic ride by this lake. as we were approaching 75th street, i noticed an orange light in the sky to the south west. it is important to note that the light was stationary (appeared to be hovering like a helicopter)and was not blinking at all. i know that all air craft have red blinking lights for safety reasons, this did not, that and the orange color is what got my attention originally. i alerted my wife to the object and she actually stopped the car. i quickly exited the vehicle and noted that the object made no noise and had now began to move in a semi-circular trajectory. i grabbed my cell phone and flipped on my video recorder, unfortunately i was unable to get any footage do to my excitement i forgot to press record, that said after approximately 10 seconds i realized that my video recorder was useless anyway showing only a speck of light here and there, i was able to follow were it was going but that's about it. so i lowered the camera and notice the object had moved to a position directly west of where i was. so up to this point it had did the semi-circle and after that headed due north to end up directly west of my position. at this point the light then began to ascend (but not at a very drastic angle) in a north west to north-north west bearing. the speed was incredible within 3-5 seconds it was out of sight! during the sighting i was very excited, and awe struck. after the sighting i am left with questions. i would like mufon to look into our local airports radar (if possible) to see if they had anything "unidentified" that night. i mentioned my wife was very skeptical about ufo's but she could not deny that what we seen was not any conventional aircraft and therefore is/was a ufo. i believe it is important to note that roughly 1 minute after the sighting a commercial aircraft flew overhead at a low altitude with 3-4 red blinking lights and several white lights under the wings. this is drastically different from what we had witnessed only moments before. if necessary i would undergo a polygraph examination to what i witnessed.

antonio m. jacob
content.summary: My wife and i seen an orange light in the sky. my wife was a strong skeptic in ufo's, now her witnessing this event has wavered her skepticism.

content.detailedDescription:
My mom & i exited her front door of her home and in the sky to the left we both seen a ball of orange yellow light getting larger and traveling fast. it then took a pretty sharp turn and continued but slower to leave. we did not get a close look at it but we are positive it was not a plane. it had no blinking lights but rather a ball of fire look. my step dad was called out front but by that time it had changed direction and he said "it's just a plane". 
our feelings were we both had never seen anything like it before and just knew it was not a plane.
content.summary: Ball of fire, coming very fast, turned quickly in other direction disappearing slowly

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my drive talking on the phone when i looked up into the west sky and noticed a bright light with a strange mushroom shaped aura above it. thinking it a bit srtange i emiditly put on my glasses so that i might get a better look at it. i then noticed that the light was what appered to be a ball of flame with a mushroom shaped bubble above it with what seamed to be polka dots in it. the aura above the object seamed to be semi transparent. i watched the object move at a fast pace to the south east at what seamed to be aproxmatly 40 degrees until it dissapared from view in less than a minite.
content.summary: Ball of fire, with mushroom shaped aura over it with what appeared to be dots in the aurai

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Just finished washing dishes and went outside to sit by lake. it was a calm and quiet night and you could see the stars and the lake was like glass.The sun had gone down. i was sitting and saw a red orange light come up and start floating towards my direction. it was very low and slow. i watched it and ran inside to get my binoculars, as i looked it looked like 2 objects  it had no navigation lights. it made no noise and did not flash or pulsate. just then another light came up and followed up the same path. the first light verred to the right. others followed same red, orange light, then they came faster and then they would double up and fly next to each other. some just vanished -while others went to my right (w). then i was not sure what i was seeing since it was so close and unusual.
then some minutes passed and again now to the west over the trees i see a lot of red orange orb lights bubbling up and around the trees. then a large orb came up and was followed by several other orb lights at least 25 or more followed, they just went and followed in a straight line and then the orbs just kept coming and then again formed 2 flying next to each other and then formed a triangle with other lights following in some sort of intelligent kind of formation. it was crazy and i don't know how these orbs could form a line, a pattern, and double up.
after this huge event i was in awe and dumbfounded, i sat for a couple of minutes- i looked over my shoulder and saw what looked like a bullet/pill white led light with a dull grey outline slowly move down in a straight line from the sky -like a star coming down from the sky. it slowly came down and  disappeared into the trees to my right. wow!
the area during this time was very dark almost pitch black. the area was also quiet with no people noise or boats. which i made the comment about.
then to my left i see again over the tree tops a line forming of these orange red lights that all do the same thing over again on the other side of the lake to the east. it looked like a a lead orange/red light would gather all the children and they would follow and make a triangle type  and intelligent type of formation, follow in single file and walk in doubles, with some sort of chaperon light following here and there.
then after that several minutes passed and again from the south straight in front of me came a lone violet/red light the biggest seen that night. it was almost oval like a football. soon it was followed about 2 minutes later by another large violet oval twin and then the first hovered and the other met with it. other round orbs came up behind red, orange, white in color and smaller and round. the lights went to my right (west) and all followed to they were all gone about 7 lights.
crazy night in beautiful michigan !!!!!!!!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Several orb sightings of various colors and patterns seen in 3 different directions

content.detailedDescription: I was at busch gardens in williamsburg va. taping the fireworks. just as i turned on my camera phone i noticed a beam of light in the sky, but thought nothing of it. i did not know what i had videotaped until a couple of days later. what you see is exactly what i filmed. what it looks like is an unidentified craft  that seems to be watching the fireworks. it moves at incredible speeds in all directions. it has what looks like a light beam coming from the craft. i have frozen the video at various points and the shape of the craft looks like a space capsule or shuttlecock. at various times it is moving so fast it is just a blur of lights. on two of the places i froze the video it takes a different shape like it is warped. thats the best i can describe it. like i said at the time i taped it i did not know what i was filming. only after seeing it  later i was in awe by what was on the video. i have tried to think of every other possibility other than a ufo that this could be. a ride at the park no someone pulling a prank i dont think so. i have no doubts this is a real ufo. there were other people there that were filming this also. i can't be the only one to have this on video.  aliens  from outerspace can't be all that bad, evidently they like fireworks too!  if i had known i was filming this i would have left my camera phone on longer. let me know what you think and if you have ever seen anything like this before.
content.summary: I video taped this at busch gardens while watching the fireworks

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a walk when i saw a black, circular object hovering in the distance.  at first i thought it was a bird but then as i got closer i could see that it was hovering and then wobbling shortly afterwards.  since i had my camera with me, i took two photos.  one while it was wobbling and another when it was stationary.  i tried to get closer and take a third but then it took off at a very high speed.  when i zoomed in on the stationary photo, i could see what i thought was a dome and windows, but i am not sure.  this was the fourth ufo, i have observed.   ever since i saw my first ufo, at the age of ten, i have been fascinated with the subject and have watched many documentaries on the topic.  i will continue to keep my eye on the sky.
content.summary: I was taking a walk when i saw a black, circular object hovering in the distance

content.detailedDescription: I heard a strange muted helicopter sound which sparked my curiosity to go outside on my front deck, i witnessed a single low flying all black military style helicopter with a pole protroding from the front and its spotlight was on( it was around sunset time with lots of light still). the helicopter did a complete circle around my house with my house in the center. i couldn't help but feel an eerie feeling like i had a gun pointing at me. i noticed it was shorter in length than a black hawk with similar windows on the side like the black  hawk but all 4-5 were equal in size. i wanted to take my cell phone out of my pocket to shoot video but an eerie feeling telling me not to came over me.
content.summary: All black helicopter with no markings, lettering or insignia
